Message:
I can hear angered shouts
in the distance...

For this country,
ravaged by the on-going conflict
between witches and humans,
stealing to survive is
just a matter of course.

That’s why an orphan like me,
dying on the side of the road,
is simply ignored.
What a good-for-nothing
world this is...

If I could be reborn,
I’d want to be a bird...
That way,
I could fly somewhere
far away from here...

When I opened my eyes,
I was surrounded by
a halo of golden light,
and a girl with blue eyes
was crying over me.

Was what I felt
just now her tears...?

The words the girl spilled
along with her tears
somehow brought me
to tears as well...

Maybe this world
isn’t so bad after all...

That was the first time in my life
I had ever thought as much.
